TopicTitle: Can you get steam to update KSP if you bought it from the KSP store?

Articles.Content:
I got the game when it was in beta and I want steam to update it for me because I don't have the time to do it myself.

Can some one please tell m if there is a way.

Hi @tigershark, Unless you have KSP on Steam then unfortunately not, but if you bought KSP before it was available on Steam you will have the option to transfer to Steam on your store account.

It's one way, so make sure it's what you want to do before going ahead.
